name: Albion
description: Uses the files from the Windows installer from GOG.

write_file.content:
[ipx] ipx=false
[autoexec]
@echo off
cls
mount c ".."
mount C "..\cloud_saves" -t overlay
imgmount d "../game.ins" -t iso -fs iso
c:
albion.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- file2: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_albion.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file2
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$file1"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosbox_albion_single.conf
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $GAMEDIR/__support/app/dosbox_albion.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_albion.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_albion.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: false
- write_file:
    content: '[ipx] ipx=false

      [autoexec]

      @echo off

      cls

      mount c ".."

      mount C "..\cloud_saves" -t overlay

      imgmount d "../game.ins" -t iso -fs iso

      c:

      albion.exe'
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosbox_albion_lutris.conf
main_file: DOSBOX/dosbox_albion_lutris.conf
